room_title: Escape room "Kill Room" by Escape Artist Texas in Houston
review: What an awesome place! We went as a family of 10 and escaped the Kill Room! The owner and staff were great and made our first visit even more memorable. We will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Kill Room" by Escape Artist Texas in Houston
review: My first time in an escape room and it was great! Simple set up but extremely challenging. I'm a big fan of Dexter so I really enjoyed the "Kill Room"!

room_title: Escape room "Kill Room" by Escape Artist Texas in Houston
review: Took our daughter and some friends for her 14th birthday! Had an amazing time in the Kill Room and was amazed at how much a seemingly empty room seriously could hide! Can't wait to come back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Kill Room" by Escape Artist Texas in Houston
review: Came here for the first time ever trying an escape room & we had a blast! Failed the jail break room but throughly enjoyed the experience and we will be back, because we can't just accept defeat! Lol Thanks to Mike for making our first time a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Kill Room" by Escape Artist Texas in Houston
review: I have gone here twice in the past 6 months, (The jail break and the kill room). The owner is super awesome the staff is great. And the location is perfect. I can't wait to go back and try the live free or die and the new ones he has coming up.
